debates.showAs: Competition and Consumer Protection (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide the Competition and Consumer Protection Commission with powers to issue administrative sanctions against undertakings engaged in anti-competitive practices by amending the Competition and Consumer Protection Act 2014; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt cumhachtaí don Choimisiún um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí chun smachtbhannaí riaracháin a eisiúint i gcoinne gnóthais atá ag gabháil do chleachtais atá frithiomaíoch, tríd an Acht um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí, 2014 a leasú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Iomaíocht agus Cosaint Tomhaltóirí (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Consumer Protection (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Consumer Protection (Amendment) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Consumer Protection (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Consumer Protection Act 2007 to provide for specified regulations relating to gift vouchers and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí, 2007, chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rialacháin shonraithe a bhainfidh le dearbháin bhronntanais agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Health and Safety (Funfair) (Amendment) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health and Safety (Funfair) (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Safety, Health and Welfare at Work Act 2005 to provide for improved health and safety standards in funfairs and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shábháilteacht, Sláinte agus Leas ag an Obair, 2005 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le caighdeáin fheabhsaithe sláinte agus sábháilteachta ag aontaí súgraidh agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte agus Sábháilteachta (Aonach Súgraidh) (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Garda Síochána (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the protection of journalists' sources.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le foinsí iriseoirí a chosain.t

debates.showAs: Roads (Criminal Activity) (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Roads Act 1993 in order to install closed circuit television cameras at motorway junctions for use by An Garda Síochána
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hAcht na mBóithre, 1993 a leasú d'fhonn ceamaraí teilifíse ciorcaid iata a shuiteáil ag acomhail mhótarbhealaigh lena n-úsáid ag an nGarda Síochána

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Knife Possession) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Firearms and Offensive Weapons Act 1990 to create a mandatory minimum sentence on conviction of unlawful possession of a knife in a public place
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na nArm Tine agus na nArm Ionsaitheach, 1990 chun go mbunófar pianbhreith íosta shainordaitheach ar dhuine a chiontú i scian a shealbhú go neamhdhleathach in áit phoiblí
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Scian a Shealbhú), 2015

debates.showAs: Garda Síochána (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a Public Order Unit for Dublin City Centre charged with improving and maintaining public order and safety in the Dublin City Centre area as set out by the Garda Commissioner
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú Aonad Oird Phoiblí le haghaidh Lárchathair Bhaile Átha Cliath a mbeidh de chúram air ord poiblí agus sábháilteacht an phobail i limistéar Lárchathair Bhaile Átha Cliath a fheabhsú agus a chothabháil de réir mar a bheidh leagtha amach ag Coimisinéir an Gharda Síochána

debates.showAs: Migrant Earned Regularisation Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a scheme to enable certain foreign nationals whose presence within the State is other than in accordance with a permission granted by or on behalf of the Minister to apply for and earn permission to remain within the State; to manage the implementation of such scheme, and to provide for matters connected therewith
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le scéim a bhunú d'fhonn a chumasú do náisiúnaigh eachtracha áirithe, atá sa Stát seachas de réir cead arna dheonú ag an Aire nó thar ceann an Aire, iarratas a dhéanamh ar chead, agus cead a ghnóthú, chun fanacht sa Stát; do dhéanamh bainistiú ar chur i ngníomh na scéime sin, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Imircigh do Ghnóthú Stádas Rialta, 2015

debates.showAs: Assaults on Elderly Persons Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to revise the law relating to the main non-fatal offences against the person and to provide for connected matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'athchóiriú an dlí a bhaineann leis na príomhchionta neamh-mharfacha in aghaidh an duine agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ionsaithe ar Dhaoine Scothaosta, 2015

debates.showAs: Garda Síochána (Amendment) Bill 2014: Second Stage [Private Members]
Garda Síochána (Amendment) Bill 2014: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Garda Síochána (Amendment) Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Garda Síochána Act 2005 in order to make the Garda Commissioner responsible to the Garda Ombudsman Commission, to allow the Garda Ombudsman Commission investigate complaints concerning any conduct of a member of the Garda Síochána made by another member of An Garda Síochána, to remove the requirement of consent in order for the Garda Ombudsman Commission to reach informal resolution of complaints, to grant the Garda Ombudsman Commission access to the Garda PULSE computer system and to permit the Garda Ombudsman Commission to examine any practice, policy or procedure of an Garda Síochána in order to prevent complaints arising
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht an Gharda Síochána, 2005 chun go mbeidh Coimisinéir an Gharda freagrach do Choimisiún Ombudsman an Gharda, chun a cheadú do Choimisiún Ombudsman an Gharda imscrúdú a dhéanamh ar ghearáin a bhaineann le haon iompar ag comhalta den Gharda Síochána arna ndéanamh ag comhalta eile den Gharda Síochána, chun deireadh a chur leis an gceanglas go dtabharfar toiliú chun go dtiocfaidh Coimisiún Ombudsman an Gharda ar réiteach neamhfhoirmiúil ar ghearáin, chun rochtain ar ríomhchóras PULSE an Gharda a dheonú do Choimisiún Ombudsman an Gharda agus chun a cheadú do Choimisiún Ombudsman an Gharda aon chleachtas, aon bheartas nó aon nós imeachta de chuid an Gharda Síochána a scrúdú chun nach dtiocfaidh gearáin chun cinn

debates.showAs: Judicial Appointments Bill 2014: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the selection, appointment and promotion of members of the judiciary, to establish a Judicial Appointments Board with responsibility for recommending to Government who should be nominated for appointment to judicial office, to give effect to the declaration of the European Network of Councils for the Judiciary on standards for the recruitment and appointment of members of the judiciary approved in Dublin on 9, 10 and 11 May 2012, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhaltaí den bhreithiúnacht a roghnú, a cheapadh agus le hardú céime a thabhairt dóibh, chun Bord um Cheapacháin Bhreithiúnacha a bhunú ar a mbeidh freagracht i leith moladh a thabhairt don Rialtas faoi na daoine is cóir a ainmniú chun a gceaptha chuig oifig bhreithiúnach, do thabhairt éifeachta don dearbhú ón nGréasán Eorpach um Chomhairlí don Bhreithiúnacht maidir le caighdeáin le haghaidh comhaltaí den bhreithiúnacht a earcú agus a cheapadh a ceadaíodh i mBaile Átha Cliath an 9, 10 agus 11 Bealtaine 2012, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Censorship of Publications Board Repeal Bill 2013: Second Stage (Resumed)
Censorship of Publications Board Repeal Bill 2013: Second Stage
Censorship of Publications Board Repeal Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to abolish the Censorship of Publications Board and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur deireadh leis an mBord um Chinsireacht Foilseachán agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Censorship of Publications Board Repeal Bill 2013
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille chun an Bord um Chinsireacht Foilseachán a Aisghairm, 2013

debates.showAs: Debt Collectors Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the regulation of debt collectors, to provide for the exercise of control over the occupation of debt collector, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le bailitheoirí fiachais a rialáil, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialú a fheidhmiú ar an tslí bheatha arb éard í bailitheoir fiachais, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Judicial Sentencing Commission Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote greater transparency and consistency in judicial sentencing, whilst maintaining the independence of the judiciary, to establish a Judicial Sentencing Commission, to promote a clear, fair and consistent approach to judicial sentencing, to produce analysis and research on sentencing, and to promote public confidence in judicial sentencing
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur trédhearcacht agus comhréireacht níos mó chun cinn maidir le gearradh pianbhreitheanna breithiúnacha, ach neamhspleáchas na breithiúnachta a chothabháil, do bhunú Coimisiúin um Ghearradh Pianbhreitheanna Breithiúnacha, do dhéanamh cur chuige soiléir, cothrom agus comhréireach a chur chun cinn i ndáil le gearradh pianbhreitheanna breithiúnacha, do dhéanamh anailís agus taighde ar ghearradh pianbhreitheanna, agus do chur muinín an phobail chun cinn maidir le gearradh pianbhreitheanna breithiúnacha
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille an Choimisiúin um Ghearradh Pianbhreitheanna Breithiúnacha, 2013

debates.showAs: Housing Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to allow for local authority tenants who have vacated their local authority house for reasons of personal safety to remain on the local authority housing waiting list
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheadú do thionóntaí údaráis áitiúil a d'fhág a dteach údaráis áitiúil ar chúiseanna sábháilteachta pearsanta fanacht ar liosta feithimh tithíochta an údaráis áitiúil

bill.longTitleEn: o amend the Local Government (Household Charge) Act 2011 by extending the date for payment of the household charge in the year 2012 to 30 September 2012 and by expressly excluding the private residences of any Government Ministers from the exemptions provided under the 2011 Act
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil (Muirear Teaghlaigh), 2011 tríd an dáta chun an muirear teaghlaigh a íoc sa bhliain 2012 a chur siar go dtí an 30 Meán Fómhair 2012 agus trí áiteanna cónaithe príobháideacha aon Airí Rialtais a eisiamh go sainráite ó na díolúintí dá bhforáiltear faoi Acht 2011

debates.showAs: Local Authority Public Administration Bill 2011: Second Stage (Resumed)
Local Authority Public Administration Bill 2011: Second Stage
Local Authority Public Administration Bill 2011: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to compel local authorities to provide members of the public and public representatives with substantive replies to written communications within a prescribed period of time
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun iallach a chur ar údaráis áitiúla freagraí substainteacha ar chumarsáidí scríofa a sholáthar do dhaoine den phobal agus d'ionadaithe poiblí laistigh de thréimhse ama fhorordaithe
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Riarachán Poiblí Údarás Áitiúil, 2011

debates.showAs: Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage (resumed)
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Order for Second Stage
Electoral (Amendment) (Political Donations) Bill 2011: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict the making of donations for political purposes by companies, trade unions, societies or building societies, to amend the law relating to the disclosure of donations to political parties and individuals, to provide for the auditing of the accounts of political parties and to implement the recommendations relating to political funding contained within the Second Report of the Tribunal of Inquiry into Payments to Politicians
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur srian le cuideachtaí, ceardchumainn, cumainn nó cumainn fhoirgníochta do thabhairt síntiús chun críoch polaitíochta, do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le síntiúis le páirtithe polaitíochta agus le pearsana aonair a nochtadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cuntais páirtithe polaitíochta a iniúchadh agus do chur i ngníomh na moltaí a bhaineann le maoiniú polaitíochta atá sa Dara Tuarascáil ón mBinse Fiosrúcháin maidir le hÍocaíochtaí le Polaiteoirí
